ygData.subject: Re: Bard only equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I know bard only equipment that comes to mind, though its not very good. Its called the shawl of the wind spirit, and has the same ac as cloth and gives
ygData.messageBody:
Well I know bard only equipment that comes to mind, though its not very
good. Its called the shawl of the wind spirit, and has the same ac as
cloth and gives +2 to cold. Its not great but its something...

Tom Lee wrote:
>
> From: Tom Lee <tom_lee@...>
>
> Hello fellow bards !
>
> I have been perusing this site for a while amongst others and have
> noticed no references to specialty items available only to bards, other
> than their instruments of course.
>
> Does anyone know if bards get their own special equipment? If so, I
> would be interested in hearing about it.
>
> Thanks,
>
> Lorenthal
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Do you know how many communities live at ONElist?
> http://www.ONElist.com
> More than 140,000 with nearly 1,000 new ones joining each day!
